Hey IMMO Max Vayne, 

I would suggest repairing your client. Sometimes, files get jumbled around and assets becomes misplaced. 

You can do so by clicking the [?] in the upper right hand corner of the client. (It's on the same screen as the orange 'launch' button.) You'll then have the option  to repair the client.

Have you verified that the border shows for your friends/allied team? 

If you still are having this issue, especially with your border, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a closer look at your account and make sure the assets were granted.
